definition: to expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen
details:
verb
- to expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen
= example: to expose to cool or cold air so as to cool or freshen
= synonyms: air
- to furnish with an opening to allow air to circulate or gas to escape
= example: to furnish with an opening to allow air to circulate or gas to escape
- to give expression or utterance to
= example: to give expression or utterance to
= synonyms: vent
- to circulate through and freshen
= example: to circulate through and freshen
- to expose to the circulation of fresh air so as to retard spoilage
= example: to expose to the circulation of fresh air so as to retard spoilage
